patthana22.21:1.1: Nasavitakkasavicāraṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana22.21:2.1: Hetuyā pannarasa, ārammaṇe pannarasa, adhipatiyā cuddasa …pe… purejāte āsevane cuddasa …pe… avigate pannarasa.
patthana22.21:3.1: Napītisahagataṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca pītisahagato hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana22.21:5.1: Nadassanena pahātabbaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bhāvanāya pahātabbo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana22.21:6.1: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
patthana22.21:7.1: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana22.21:8.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cuddasa, adhipatiyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cuddasa.
patthana22.21:9.1: Naācayagāmiṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca apacayagāmī hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana22.21:10.1: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
patthana22.21:11.1: Nasekkhaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asekkho hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana22.21:12.1: Hetuyā nava …pe… āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.
